sections.Biography:
===Background===
Corlys Wells hails from [[Stoney Sept]].

==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
Corlys arrives at [[Castle Black]] alongside [[Errold Holt]] and [[Britt Warrick]].<ref>"[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"</ref>
